item.title: Bookshelf
item.description: List of books I’ve read recently. It’s more like a book journal, where I add notes for stuff I don’t want to forget if I am taking a break from a series or cool quotes I liked.

item.title: Pokemon Shinng Pearl

item.title: TV Shows
item.description: Based on the data I’ve been logging in trakt.tv for the past 6 years, I’ve watched more than 5500 episodes of shows.
